metadata.name: Atlassian Confluence CVE-2022-26134
metadata.comment: Detects spawning of suspicious child processes by Atlassian Confluence server which may indicate successful exploitation of CVE-2022-26134

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND startswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/opt/atlassian/confluence/')) AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/java')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/bin/sh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bash')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dash')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ksh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('zsh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('csh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('fish')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('curl')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wget')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('python'))))

output.summary: Detects spawning of suspicious child processes by Atlassian Confluence server which may indicate successful exploitation of CVE-2022-26134
